author: tomlobo

comments.content: excellent, thanks so much, haha, yeah i though it would be something obvious!

[Ultinoid](http://web.archive.org/web/20100916191546/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/ultinoid/) seems to be a grungier version of the first sample. I'm guessing it was originally a Letraset font from back in the day.

- Lex

The first sample uses a version of San Serif Shaded (Wm. Thorowgood, 1839). Dieter Steffmann offers [his version](http://web.archive.org/web/20100916191546/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/s/sans_serif.htm) and [Opti](http://web.archive.org/web/20100916191546/http:/www.castcraft-software.com/homepage.html) reportedly had a version.

thanks so much Mike F and everyone else who helped!
